description: --- tags: - translation license: apache-2.0 --- ### opus-mt-en-ru * source languages: en * target languages: ru * OPUS readme: en-ru * dataset: opus * model: transformer-align * pre-processing: normalization + SentencePiece * download original weights: opus-2020-02-11.zip * test set translations: opus-2020-02-11.test.txt * test set scores: opus-2020-02-11.eval.txt ## Benchmarks | testset | BLEU | chr-F | |-----------------------|-------|-------| | newstest2012.en.ru | 31.1 | 0.581 | | newstest2013.en.ru | 23.5 | 0.513 | | newstest2015-enru.en.ru | 27.5 | 0.564 | | newstest2016-enru.en.ru | 26.4 | 0.548 | | newstest2017-enru.en.ru | 29.1 | 0.572 | | newstest2018-enru.en.ru | 25.4 | 0.554 | | newstest2019-enru.en.ru | 27.1 | 0.533 | | Tatoeba.en.ru | 48.4 | 0.669 |
model_explanation_gemini: Translates text from English (en) to Russian (ru) using a transformer-based model trained on OPUS datasets.
